content.rendered:
Asia business expansion

Expand and
operate across Asia seamlessly.

We know markets across a broad range of industries to help you start your expansion in Asia and the region on the right foot, with or without forming a local entity.

Schedule a discovery call
You’ll be talking with one of our experts.



  • Multiple projects, one invoice

    Easily manage multiple projects with Acclime across multiple territories under a single invoice.

  • Dedicated account manager

    You will have one account manager for all your expansion projects; a single contact point for simpler, more streamlined communication.

  • Ongoing compliance services

    Continue your expansion journey while staying compliant in all territories with our complete corporate services.

Expansion solutions

Three ways to expand into Asia and beyond.

Discover our three solutions allowing you to expand with or without having to setup local entities. The solutions are scalable and come with no hidden fees.

Company formation.

When you feel ready, Acclime will support you in setting up your entity in Asia and wider region, transfer EoR employees to your new entity and help keep your business compliant and watertight.

  • Company registration

  • Registered & virtual office

  • Resident director & shareholder

  • Bank account opening

Contact us for pricing

Employer of record (EoR).

Start your journey in Asia risk-free without having to set up your own entity. We will compliantly hire and onboard your team, become their legal employer and take care of all the HR-related matters.

  • Employee onboarding
  • Employment contract drafting
  • Monthly payroll processing
  • Daily HR matters

Starting from
US$499
Per month / employee

Request a custom quote

Regional
payroll.

Simplify your payroll in Asia with our regional payroll solution delivered by our in-country experts. A simple, all-inclusive fee to run and manage your entire payroll operations across 10 jurisdictions.

  • Seamless regional payroll
  • One consolidated invoice for all jurisdictions
  • Local expertise
  • In 10 jurisdictions

Contact us for pricing

Regional reach, local footprint.

With a presence in 16 markets and counting, you can rely on our local experts to make your expansion fully compliant and seamless.

  • Australia

  • Cambodia

  • China

  • Hong Kong – China

  • Indonesia

  • India

  • Japan

  • Laos

  • New Zealand

  • Malaysia

  • Myanmar

  • Philippines

  • South Korea

  • Taiwan

  • Thailand

  • Vietnam

Why expand with Acclime.

  • In-house services

    Leverage our local expertise of Asia and the region with 20+ local support offices.

  • Tailored approach

    Each expansion case is unique. We focus on flexibility rather than scalability.

  • Built-in compliance

    We use local legal partners in each market to get you covered.

  • Transparency at core

    From monthly invoices to employment agreement, there are no hidden fees.

Solution comparison

Expansion solutions at a glance.

Company formation
Employer of record (EoR)
Regional payroll
Ideal for Established corporations looking to do long-term business in the country. Fast-growing companies seeking fast market penetration & externalising auxiliary services. Established corporations looking to outsources & simplify their payroll processing.
Upfront costs Contact us From US$499 Contact us
Ongoing costs Contact us From US$499/month Contact us
Complexity High Medium Low
Market entry speed Slow Fast Fast
Duration Long-term Mid-term Long-term
Liability High Low Low
Flexibility Low Medium High
Scalability Maximum Medium High
Request a custom quote Request a custom quote Request a custom quote

Not sure which solution is best for you?

Download our EoR playbook

Read our Acclime EoR Playbook brochure to find out more details about your expansion options.

Download brochure

Onboarding process

Seamless onboarding experience for you and your new team.

  • Review Acclime’s PEO proposal

    Review our custom made PEO proposal for your expansion project in China.

  • Review MSA & engagement letter

    Review Acclime master service Agreement (MSA) and Engagement letter (EL).

  • Initial fund
    invoice

    Acclime will send the first invoice for the project deposit and the first payroll month to onboard your employee.

  • Consultant onboarding kickoff

    Acclime will onboard the consultant by collecting the onboarding information to draft the contracts.

  • Mission letter drafting

    Acclime will draft the mission letter and submit it to the client for review & signature.

  • Consultant onboarded

    After signing the Employment Agreement, the consultant is compliantly onboarded on our local payroll.

  • Ongoing payroll invoice

    Acclime will send you the ongoing invoice for the consultancy project.

  • Ongoing
    support

    Acclime will support all daily queries from the consultant and the client.

Additional corporate services

Continue your expansion journey with Acclime.

With or without entity, expansion is just the beginning of your journey in the region. By partnering with Acclime, we can ensure ongoing regulatory compliance and seamless management of your business in Asia.

  • 1. Employer of record

    Start your journey in Asia and the region risk-free without having to set up your own entity.

  • 2. Company formation

    When ready, we will support you in forming a local entity and transferring your EoR employees.

  • 3. Accounting & tax

    Take compliance off your mind and outsource your accounting, bookkeeping & tax matters.

  • 4. Payroll outsourcing

    Pay your employees easier & faster without the overhead of having your dedicated HR team.

Ready to start your regional expansion with Acclime?

  • Request a custom quote
  • Schedule a discovery call

Stay in the know in Asia.
